page.title: 02FOOTBALL IN DEEPING ST.JAMES
page.content: There are a lot of football clubs in this area like Deeping Rangers, Bourne Head Rangers,Royce Rangers, Stamford YMCA,Deeping St.James cubs and Market Deeping. There is only one club in our block,{Walnut Tree F.C. Walnut Tree Football Club is named after the pub of the same name in Deeping St.James.The pitch we use is situated just outside of the village. It is opposite the signal box and level crossing.Members of the team have to be between 9 and 12 years old. We have two old caravans where we change.Our kit is an orange top, blue shorts,and yellow socks. We have to pay 30p a match to pay for the referee.The manager pays Â£10 a season to the Stamford and district league. During the 1984-5 season we were bottom of the league,conceding 71 goals and scoring only 2 !!
